attributes.action: Push back the Autumn exams for A-levels to February.
attributes.additional_details: This has affected me, as my whole career has come to a sudden halt. I feel like this is something that will help students get back on track.
attributes.background: We know many people were done extremely wrong with the grades awarded to them. They are in shock, and most wouldn’t have expected it. To be honest a lot of people probably haven’t done enough work for exams to be around November, so they should be pushed back.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548626

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here: 

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people  

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
